manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: THE ENGINE MADE A LOUD NOISE.  *JB  AT 10K MILES, THE NOISE WAS NOTICEABLE.  THE TECHNICIANS STATED THE PROBLEM WAS NORMAL AND THERE WAS NO PROBLEM.  THE NOISE GRADUALLY WORSENED.  A BUZZ NOISE WAS HEARD WHEN MAKING THE LEFT TURN SIGNAL WAS USED.  THE COMBO SWITCH WAS REPLACED DUE TO A SHORT.  ALSO THE HEATER BLOWER MOTOR MADE A NOISE AS WELL.  THE ENGINE SMOKED AT TIMES, DIED AND WHEN RESTARTED IT DID NOT RUN PROPERLY.  THE SUNROOF DRAINS WERE DRAINING INTO THE ROCKER PANELS AND CAUSED WATER TO OVERFLOW ONTO THE DRIVER'S FLOOR.  THE TRIM PANEL ON THE REAR DOOR WAS DEFORMED.  SCC
